titleStmt.title: Upon the death of that aged, pious, sincere-hearted Christian, John Alden, Esq. late magistrate of New-Plimouth Colony, who died Sept. 12th, 1687, being about eighty nine years of age.
titleStmt.author: Cotton, John, 1640-1699.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: stained, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
